channel.title: Sending Text Messages to Cell Phones from AIM
channel.description:
This is quite easy but I don't think many people know about this.
1.) Open up your AIM and sign in.
2.) Click on People.
[img]http://img183.imageshack.us/img183/9346/pplbf7.png[/img]
3.) Goto and click on Send Instant Message...
[img]http://img174.imageshack.us/img174/6460/sendimei3.png[/img]
4.) Click on the "To:" form.
[img]http://img174.imageshack.us/img174/8215/im1vr4.png[/img]
5.) Enter in "+" then the country code and area code, then the phone number.
[img]http://img184.imageshack.us/img184/4947/im2eh0.png[/img]
After that you just send it as if it were a regular instant message and the person can reply too :). You can also add the number to your buddy list for later use :)

item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

mvp566:

erm, this doesent work for the newest AIM, at least i havent fount the text message part.

Oh, it should…it’ll just look different.

EDIT: otherwise just use http://ftp.newaol.com/aim/win95/Install_AIM59.exe

item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

This is quite easy but I don’t think many people know about this.

1.) Open up your AIM and sign in.

2.) Click on People.

3.) Goto and click on Send Instant Message…

4.) Click on the “To:” form.

5.) Enter in “+” then the country code and area code, then the phone number.

After that you just send it as if it were a regular instant message and the person can reply too :). You can also add the number to your buddy list for later use
